description.value: Simple arrows made with shafts of wood and simple iron heads, the primary ammuntion that is shot from bows.
A sturdy steel long sword with a baisc enchatment to allow to to slice and dice better.

A small glass tube, that contains a warm red glowing liquid that will quickly heal minor wounds when drunken.

Minor Action. Drinking this point and spends a healing surge, instead of the hitpoint you would normaly regain, regain 4d4 hit points.
Elegent cloth designed to signify wealth and status in society.
A bag for storing your belongings and loot. Standard Action to retreave inventory items from this container.
A fine place to sleep comfortably and snugly on the cold hard ground while out adventuring.
A small, but easily accessible pouch perfect for storing items that you use regularly or need in a quick pinch. It is a minor action to retrieve items stored within belt pouches.
A mix of dried and well preserved food that trades flavor for compactness and is best suited for extended travel.

A long coil of sturdy hemp rope.


DC 10 Athletic Check to climb.

• Bright Light radius of 20 sq.
  • 4 Hours of burn time.

• Bright Light radius of 20 sq.
  • 4 Hours of burn time.
Contains roughly 2 quarts or 4 pints of liquid.

A light and slender piece of wood that is used as a magical implement for focusing and casting spells.

This one is particulally accurate giving +1 to all implement attack rolls.  

It is magically enhanced for brutally high critical damage (in addition to the usual +1 to attack and damage)

Average Height: 5´ 6˝–6´ 2˝

Average Weight: 140–230 lb.

Ability Score:

  • +2 Intelligence
  • +2 Charisma

Size: Medium

Base Speed: 6 squares

Vision: Low-light

Languages:

  • Common
  • choice of one other

Skill Bonuses:

  • +2 Bluff
  • +2 Stealth

Bloodhunt: @Compendium[dnd4e.racial_features.giIAbpQ7vaaXOcnz]{You gain a +1 racial bonus to attack rolls against bloodied foes}

Fire Resistance: You have resist fire 5 + one-half your level.

Infernal Wrath: Gain the @Item[ofwCoL5GjIFoQfkq]{Infernal Wrath} as an encounter power.

effects.name: Combat Weapon Talent Bonus
effects.description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with attacks made with a one-handed weapon.

description.value: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with attacks made with a one-handed weapon.

Role: Defender. You are very tough and have the exceptional ability to contain enemies in melee

Power Source: Martial. You have become a master of combat through endless hours of practice, determination, and your own sheer physical toughness.

Key Abilities:

  • Strength
  • Dexterity
  • Wisdom
  • Constitution

Armour Proficiencies:

  • @Compendium[dnd4e.srd_armour.WLgMmkXD3u1t8fmQ]{Cloth armor (basic clothing)}
  • @Compendium[dnd4e.srd_armour.rsZH8gZlOExg1dJj]{Leather armor}
  • @Compendium[dnd4e.srd_armour.XGOL4mHjFMZnGbKH]{Hide armor}
  • @Compendium[dnd4e.srd_armour.IgdllULPU4GC4lrD]{Chainmail}
  • @Compendium[dnd4e.srd_armour.DF2QzgYkZRxUKTqD]{Scale armor}
  • @Compendium[dnd4e.srd_armour.1FjDgA8ItfLYWgAv]{Light Shield}
  • @Compendium[dnd4e.srd_armour.emAEjrwJh4lfRTeu]{Heavy Shield}

Weapon Proficiencies:

  • @Compendium[dnd4e.srd_rules.4vItzLTePIjC1MbI]{Simple Melee Weapons}
  • @Compendium[dnd4e.srd_rules.oRfaQkmDSxWMx5Ln]{Military Melee Weapons}
  • @Compendium[dnd4e.srd_rules.XKgEgbttyURcvqns]{Simple Ranged Weapons}
  • @Compendium[dnd4e.srd_rules.xttyKhBLZaMknOGm]{Military Ranged Weapons}

Bonus to Defences:

  • +2 Fort 

Hit Points at 1st Level:: [[15]] + Con Score

Hit Points per Level Gained: [[6]]

Base Healing Surges per Day: [[9]] + Con Mod

Skill Training, three from the following list:

  • Athletics (Str)
  • Endurance (Con)
  • Healing (Wis)
  • Intimidate (Cha)
  • Streetwise (Cha)

Class Features:

  • @Compendium[dnd4e.class_features.mF4kYDvvTXdlS0Yc]{Combat Challenge}
  • @Compendium[dnd4e.class_features.jRaB5ay4sxeqxDLA]{Combat Superiority}

Choose one of the following Combat Weapon Talent:

  • @Compendium[dnd4e.class_features.LyGfDZrbzt7kQgVT]{Fighter Weapon Talent - One Handed}
  • @Compendium[dnd4e.class_features.7rpBJ6SFiJpZYHtS]{Fighter Weapon Talent - Two Handed}

Tapping your infernal blood has some useful side effects.  

  • +1 feat bonus to attack rolls on fire powers.
  • +2 feat bonus to damage rolls on fire powers.

This feat demonstrates an effect that automatically adds the attack and damage bonuses to any power that has the fire property
Jack of all trades, master of none. You gain a +2 feat bonus to untrained skill.

+2 to Running movement speed

+2 to Charging movement speed

You gain an additioanl 5 hit points per tier.

Level 1 to 10: +5 HP

Level 11 to 20: +10 HP

Level 21 to 30: +15 HP

Nobody is entirely sure why this ritual was created, probably a druidic prank.

On completion of this ritual [[/roll 1d4]] @UUID[Compendium.dnd4e.example_character.Actor.n1LXn8qhWKAwCErL]{Badgers} appear in the square occupied by the caster.

The ritual does not give caster any ability to command or communicate with the summoned badgers.

The summoning process appears to put the badgers into a foul mood, which will be directed at the nearest thing to them, usually the caster. The nature check result is used to determine their reaction to summoning.

Check Result

Badger Reaction

15

Enraged: Will immediately attack the summoner.

15-24

Grumpy: Will attack if threatened, provoked or looked at funny. Otherwise will wander off.

25+

Annoyed: Will wander off unless attacked or provoked.

This power is totally homebrew, it demonstrates implement area effect powers, and how to use an effect that gives a conditional bonus.  (It is effected by @Compendium[dnd4e.example_feats.i8wF69SvMbVUeD9M]{Flames of the 9 Hells})

Also that this text description will not show, as a flavour text was explicitly specified.

hit.detail: 1d8 + @intMod Fire damage and the target takes ongoing 5 Fire Damage (save ends).

miss.detail: Half Damage and no ongoing damage

system.chatFlavor: Eternity of being a punching bag has given Steve a fiery temper.

description.value: Armed with a weapon, you make a simple strike at your target.

system.special: Increases to 2[W] + Strength modifier damage at 21st level

description.value: You loose your projectile forward towards your mark.

system.special: Increases to 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage at 21st level

description.value: A quick strike with the weapon in your primary hand.

system.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.

description.value: A followup strike with the weapon in your off hand.

system.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.

description.value: You with great precision you strike at your foe.
You launch a distracting flurry of blows at your foe allowing for your companion to attempt to safely escape.

hit.detail: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, an ally adjacent to the target can shift up to 2 squares.

description.value: You call upon the ancestry of of your infernal blood to bring wrath and vengeance upon the foe who dared to harm you.

effect.detail: You channel your rage and gain a +1 power bonus to your next attack roll against a target that hit you since your last turn. If the attack hits and deals damage, increase the damage by @chaMod (Charisma Modifier) as bonus damage.

description.value: You rub some dirt into your wounds, bear down and press forward.

effect.detail: Until the end of the encounter, and while you are bloodied you gain regeneration [[2 + @conMod]] (2 + Constitution Mod)

description.value: With great ferocity, you pursue your foe with ever strengthening blows

hit.detail: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to attacks, and +4 bonus to damage rolls against the target.

miss.detail: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +1 bonus to attacks, and +2 bonus to damage rolls against the target.

description.value: [[+1]] bonus to attack rolls made against bloodied targets.
description.gm: This feature can toggled on or off according to the status of the target.

effects.name: Blood Hunter
effects.description: [[+1]] bonus to attack rolls made against bloodied targets.

system.biography: Rencarnated across the planes of existance for a cruel deity's amusement, cursed to forever be a punching bag.

details.height: Average Height, but will tell you he's 6'0"
details.weight: Large fellow with a bit of a bear gut.
